nodes.text: Black Market was a Republic propaganda poster, encouraging its citizens to report unauthorized trade. The poster depicted a crate that outwardly states "Power converters", but is shown to have at least four DL-44 heavy blaster pistols and some other blaster barrels coming out. The font is in High Galactic, and has on top "There's a reason it's called the Black market", with the last two words being enlarged for emphasis, and at the bottom has the following given in orange: "Shadowy dealings only benefit those who operate from the shadows: Our Enemies! Republic Law demands that you report all unauthorized trade", with the "Our Enemies" phrase being highlighted in yellow.
